Name: must_have_certified_skills
Description: Workers assigned to critical tasks must be certified

Name: cannot_assign_blocked_task
Description: Tasks with blocking status cannot be planned

Name: must_have_available_worker
Description: Only workers with availability can be assigned

Name: may_include_high_priority_features
Description: High priority features are preferred when capacity allows

Name: must_limit_team_size
Description: Team size must be within acceptable bounds

Name: must_active_sprint
Description: Only active sprints can receive backlog items

Name: may_use_remote_teams
Description: Teams in remote locations may be considered if needed

Name: must_respect_total_effort
Description: Total sprint backlog effort must fit the capacity

Name: must_review_release_status
Description: Only release plans with valid status are selectable

Name: cannot_start_unready_story
Description: User stories not in ready status cannot be scheduled

Name: must_target_correct_audience
Description: Projects must specify a target audience

Name: may_include_review_feedback
Description: Feedback documentation may guide selection after review
